thread.title: Peoples Bank Names Debbie Arnold as VP
thread.title_full: Peoples Bank Names Debbie Arnold as VP

title: Peoples Bank Names Debbie Arnold as VP
text:
by Alexis Hosticka on Wednesday, Aug. 19, 2015 1:20 pm Debbie Arnold ( Peoples Bank ) 
Debbie Arnold has joined Peoples Bank as Vice President of Marketing according to Mary Fowler, President and CEO. 
“We are very excited to have Debbie join our Peoples Bank family,” Fowler said in a news release. “She has earned a great reputation in the banking industry, and we know she will be a valuable addition to our team.” 
Arnold comes to Peoples Bank with more than 29 years of bank marketing experience. Arnold is an honor graduate of Southern Arkansas University with a Bachelor’s degree in Finance and General Business and graduated from Arkansas Bankers School of Bank Marketing and the American Bankers School of Bank Marketing and Management at the University of Colorado. 
Arnold has a long history of community service, including the Southern Arkansas University Mulerider Club Advisory Board, Magnolia Junior Charity League, Magnolia Blossom Festival, Relay For Life, Leadership Magnolia and Magnolia-Columbia County Chamber of Commerce Board of Directors and banquet chairman. Arnold was the recipient of the Leadership Magnolia Distinguished Alumni Award for community service in 2013.
